(Due to the fact that everyone says i moded, I go back to Plintissa walking=
 around the Maximal base.)

Plintissa looked at Prowl putting Iron Raptor i=
nto the CR Chamber and sighed. plintissa slowly walked through the Maximal =
base, just walking around for old times sakes, until she came back to Prowl=
.

"Prowl, sorry I blew my cool outside the base, I shouldn't take my frust=
rations for Liono out of you, so i'm sorry" Plintissa said, she extended he=
r hand to Prowl.

Outside the base, Dracona was getting a bit angry of wait=
ing for Plintissa, and walked inside the base (Dracona was never the target=
 of the autoguns.) to see what she was doing. The Radicons sighed and start=
ed to play cards. Sinesis and Sinester ran away, the Radicons could hear th=
em mumbling about how they had better things to do. Suukie, without anyone =
knowing, wandered off, leaving a note in the shoulder plate of Stronghold, =
the large bot never noticing as he smoked and played cards. Suukie walked o=
ff toward the Pred base to fight them on his own!...
